text: Pandeyji...one of the most brilliant minds I have seen aur kaafi fortunate hoon ki tumhare jaise log mere dost hain. Learned a lot of things from you since my first year, and you still inspire me to try to run after excellence and how to be an ideal student.  First year me there room me bulla kaatna, padhai ki baate krna, gaana gana, loco khelna, politics ki baate krna ye kaafi fond memories hain. Uske baad wing tootne ke baad interaction km ho gyi but still kaafi baate hoti rehti thi. To me you'll always be a person who is not at all startled by the success hi gets and pursues excellence and not success, cuz success excellence ke peeche jhak maarke aa jaati and you are an example of that. Cheers bhai...aane waale dino me kaafi naam kroge ye hume poora bharosa hain tumpe.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: One of my close friends in IITK...you are a man with a golden heart. Kafi mast memories hain saath me, like quiz se pehle raat ko aake pucchna konsa part padhna hain aur saath me doubts clear krna...control lab ki submissions, MT aur Southern labs ka chai samosa in 6th sem. I remember there bday ke pichle raat ko saath me koi assignment kr the and after 12 tune btaya hi nhi ki tera bday that (very foolish of me ki yaad nhi rkha, wrna canteen lekr jaata tereko)....aur kaafi discussions regarding aim in life, motivation after bad quizzes, aur time management krna. I hope tum aise hi cheerful aur mast rho. All the best for your future endeavours.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Hello Adi bhai, apna history toh as you said kaafi puraani hain. Allen me saath me classes aur AH sir ki gaaliyan sunna, Paul sir ke OC lecs,  saath me tests ke baad lunch krna with our gang in the test centre, shi the wo din. I always knew tu ultra maggu hain since the JEE days with a good sense of humour. Reading from the other memoirs jo tumhare Mech ke dost likhe hain, it seems you are God level chapu. Baaki apna short time jo Kartik ke saath bitaye the wo shi tha, yaad rhenge wo. I sincerely like your dedication towrads academics and other stuffs like painting. Kabhi kabhi lgta kaash I could be more sincere like you. Abhi kuch din pehle dekha tu Qualcomm me intern kr rha, which is awesome and congrats for that. Aise hi phodte rho, and I'm pretty sure kuch saalo bad tu pkka Dr.Singh bnega :)). Wishing you all the best for your future, although I know for sure its very bright. Tum bhai touch me rehna...hum toh rkhenge hi from my side.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: To me you are one of the cool guys of CHE department whom I look upon in awe and amazement. Bhut zyada interactions to nhi hue apne beech, but jitna bhi hua I really have nothing but respect. Tumhare skills aur kaam ko dekhkr kaafi mza aata...latest example being your presentation in CHE677, plus your photography. Also had a good time working with you on TA201 project(wo vanishing statue waala). Also love your attitude and your ability to keep calm in tough times(never saw you getting frustrated during that project work, and also in general). Aise hi machate rho...and I'm pretty many guys will take inspiration from you. All the best for the future endeavours
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Arshdeep bhai...I really want to know tum humesha itne chill aur khush kaise rehte, always with a smile on your face. Kaafi ache aur helpful bnde ho. And no matter course kaisa bhi jaata tumhara, you always remained positive. I really wish you success in life, and never ever let the positive approach you have towards everything go away.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Aviral bhai...apni toh kaafi dino se partnership chl rhi due to chemineers. Aur fir saath me chemical ki classes me baithna with Harshit, saath me core job ke sapne dekhna(jo abhi bhi dekh hi rhe), chemineers ke events organise krna, simutech mentorship etc etc. Honestly, you are one of the modest and humble guys I've seen in IITK. Abhi ek aur saal hain apan dono ka Dual me, with common ambitions. Let's see kya hota. Very fortunate to have you as my friend.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Hi Deeksha, hope you are doing well. Well, I agree that we haven't had many interactions except while doing ESO205 lab together, which was a good experience altogether. You are one of the most dedicated students in our department, and an all-rounder too with involvements in Hindi Sahitya Sabha, and other places. I'm pretty sure you'll achieve something amazing in the future based o how much I know you. All the best for your future.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Hello Deepesh bhai...first year se kaafi dosti thi humari. You being one of my official IITK ka bhai. Kaafi chapu ho tum ye first year me dikh gya tha. Loved you passion for physics. Fir room bhi exchange krne pde the apan ko due to my snoring :)). I will always be grateful to you for being the one who introduced me to anime and esp Naruto( that changed my life in ways you know too and is still changing). Saath me padhai aur anime ki baate krna, cycle share krna, your stories of your ex-gfs especially jiske liye tum Kolkata tk aa gya tha. Kaafi dukh dard dekhe hai tera, esp after your breakup. Also thanks for the suggestions from you regarding my academics and intern preparations. But, yaar jyyuki wing alag ho gyi we lost touch slowly, and covid ne toh pura chuda diya sb kuch...kaafi yaadein aa rhi ye memoir likhte waqt tumhari aur Bibhor ke saath kaati hui. Kaafi mast interaction hoti thi apan teeno ka. Hope we can meet sometime and talk. And,needless to say tum kaafi bda aadmi bnoge, iske ke liye wishes ki zarutrat nhi. Ye surety hain.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Hello Divyansh bhai, it's true apni zyada baate hui nhi. But, jitni bhi hui, I will remember you as a chaapu yet fun loving and comical person. Tumhare H12PL ke satirical impressions of Aakash Chopra and Jatin Sapru with Yogi ji kaafi yaad rhenge. Apan logo ka shyad 2nd year summer me wing leke panga hua tha if you remember, meeting room me kaafi lambe discussion chle the tumhari aur humari wing me. Saath me ek baar GD prep bhi ki thi internship se pehle. Anyways, aise hi mast insaan rho aur chaapte rho. All the best for your future endeavours.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Harsh...you are one of the most hard-working and sincere persons I have ever seen. I have seen how hard you used to work in labs and in  the humanoid team. And I liked you simple attitude towards your work. I do remember the walks after breakfast we used to take during summer sem jb tum robotics ka koi internship apply kr rhe the, and also the endsem of CHE381A jb humlogo ka collaborated effort lga tha paper krne me. I hope tum aage bhi aise hi cheerful simple hard working attitude rkhoge aur mast chapoge future me and maybe pursue robotics in future. Cheers bhai!! Aur haan, laptop ab toh ek nya lelo bhai agar nhi liye ho to  :)
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: One of my close friends in IITK. Learnt a lot from you in regards to subject and also life. Aur, baaki chemineers me saath kaam krne ka aur end me saath chalane ke yaadein toh humesha rhengi hi saath. Especially saath me sessions plan krna....aur fir party krna. Kabhi saath me trip krenge yhi bas ichha hain. Also remembering the samosa and puri sabji in MT with you and Achyut in 6th sem after CRE's classes.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Hello Jaya. You are one of the most hard-working person I have ever seen. Apni interaction normally courses me assignements, quizzes aur grades lekr hote, also lab work. Kaafi sincere aur ethical ho tum acc to me, hard to find in people nowadays. Apna colloid me project ka kaam bhi mast tha. It was good interacting with you in the 4 years. Hope you succeed in your future endeavours.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Kartik or DOPA...one of the most kindest and fun loving friends I have at IITK. Its people like you who are essential in life in our toughest times and also for a proper functioning of wing. Saath me mze krna aur enjoy krna tumse hi seekha hai maine. Aur dance bhi krte rho, you are very good at that. Mze me rho aur chinta na kro zyada....you will have a great future.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Sahil bhai (president sahab), we have lots of memories together. First sem me yaad ho toh kaafi baar ECO101 me saath me baithte the..me being sleepy and getting bored and you listening it with attention, cuz tujhe economics mast samajh aati thi. Moving on to 2nd year, Chemical ke courses me saath baithkr mje kiye Ankit ke saath. Also humara TA202A ka pochha machine toh yaad hi hoga tujhe, jo mast pochha lgaya humara evaluation time pe. Fir tu Hall 2 presi bn gya...kaafi busy ho gye, pr apni bonding chemical ne bnayi rkhi ifywim. Kaafi mast insaan ho tum honestly, with good leadership skills. Kaafi mast experience tha tere saath TA me kaam krne ka. Aur fir apne chemical ke courses ke baate toh hai hi. Thoda khush ho jaata agar tu yaar khudse thoda chemical padh leta (I know you hate and fear it to the bones). But, I do feel great that I am great friends with the President of Hall 2. Wish you all the best for the future.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Most humble and ethical man I have seen in my IITK life. Got to know you from 3rd year majorly and then when we both converted to Dual, dosti gehri bn gyi. I remember how you pushed me to solve Thermo problems in detail cuz tu exam see pehle puchhega and then bta nhi paaya toh khudko bura lgega. Indirectly you have made me a better student in terms of solving more problems and doing more practice before exams to prevent mistakes. Also I expect tu aage rona dhona thoda km krega and I sincerely want you to continue being an ethical (which is very hard in these times honestly) and morally sound person that you are. Dosti bani the...that's what I wish.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Muddu bhai...one of the most chillest and bakchodi waala persons I have ever and will see. Tere jaise log hi hote hain jo hum jaise serious logo ko bhi chill krana seekha dete. Tera mahino tk naa nahana (thanks to Covid ye sudhar gya), sote rehna aur exams se pehle Godspeed me slides dekhkr exam dena with pta nhi khaa khaa likhkr le jaata tha chits, ye zindagi bhar yaad rhegi. Aur saath me intern ke time test dene jaana aur fir katwakr aa jaana we have come a long way from that. Bs aise hi bakchodi me rho and aage mere jasie serious logo ko bhi hasna aur chill krna seekha dena...cuz we need guys like you., life easy aur tension free ho jaati for atleast some time.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Nikhil bhai...to be honest apna same wing hote huye bhi 2nd year me jb hum logo ka wing toota tb tumse zyada baatchit hui. In beginning I used to find you rude and somewhat arrogant since tu itna zor zor ka Haryanvi gaana bajata tha aur zor zor se bulla maarta tha...but by 3rd year I had grown fond of you and had respect for your attitude and behaviour. And thanks to you kaafi cheezo ka exposure mila tumhari sangat me (ifywim :) ). Abhi ek saal baaki hai (since tu bhi ab Matka me bhi Matka lol), usme pehle jo masti na kr ske tumhare saath wo krenge. Cheers.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Hello Nipun bhai...first year ke kaafi yaadein hai tumhari, you being Tauuaa master and other nickname given you by Pandeyji (likh nhi rha due to reasons :) ). Tumhara Mess Secy ka campaigning and fir election jeetkr Mess secy bnna. You were the best Mess secy in the 3 years of our stay in Hall 12. And then studying ESO208 together aur assignments jo tu mera use krta tha. But, on an honest note, you are one of the people whom I have seen grow to an awesome personality, and as you have said in your bio, kaafi optimized life jiye ho iss 4 saal me, something which many fail to do. Bss yhi dukh reh gya ki wapis mil nhi paaye since pandemic and we have lost touch since tum kaafi busy ho gye gymkhana aur drams ke responsibilities me, and also wing bhi alag ho gyi thi. Anyways, All the best for your future endeavours, I can already say with confidence (likh ke lelo types) ki tum kaafi successful aadmi bnoge, due to the personality you have built in your stay at IITK.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Hello Pawan bhai!! First year se wingie hai yet as you said kaafi zyada baate nhi hui...reason being hum dono kaafi alag hain personality wise. But, there are some traits of your personality jo hum apne me laana chahte, jaise your level of confidence and positivity, leadership and mangement skills jo tumne kaafi dikhaye hall me cricket league organise krwake aur sports council ke kaafi events organise krwake, and also your ability to bond with anyone you like. Kaafi ache time spend kiye hai wing ke parties me, yaad ho toh tumne hi mujhe pehli baar sutta pilaya tha. It's for you guys that college me kuch experiences jo shyad chhut jaati apni wo nhi chhuti. Uss ke liye thank you. Aise hi mast rho, aur aage machate rho apne tarike se.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Hello Pradeep bhai...you will always remind me of a simple, humble guy jo dosto ki khushi me khush hota, and is very happy with himself and working in his own pace. Kaafi friendly aur doston pr pyaar nicchawar krne waale bnde ho...much like Dil Chahta Hain ka Saif Ali Khan (along with Kartik). I know that apni bhut zyaada baate nhi hui, pr jitne bhi hui, kaafi acha lga. Politics ki baate, ESO205 ke assignments (11 bje hota tha tu aata tha room pr discuss krne 9-10 ke around). Kaafi ajeeb gya tha wo course. NH91 me apni wing parties toh yaad rhengi hi. Aise hi ho, simple, loyal, friendly,humble kaafiaage badhoge tum, ye pkka hain. All the best for your future endeavours.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Hi Prakhar!! Hope you are doing well. One of the chappu people in CHE, your excellence in acads and other technical stuffs never seizes to amaze me. By nature to tum geek hi lgte hume. Mess me baate toh classes aur grades lekr hi hoti rehti this...esp after exams ki prof kidhar A ka boundary lgaega. I still recall me reactions when after CHE381 midsem, apan sbki l lgi huyi this, or tumse puche toh fir seriously lga ki yaar kaash isske jaisa kbhi ho paate, kaisa bhi paper ho phod hi deta hain. Aise hi machate rho. I hope we meet soon if college reopens someday
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Honestly, didn't get to know you much until the 3rd year end. Always tumhe as a shy and introvert student hi dekha...and me being of same type never bothered to talk with many people except the ones in my vicinity. 4th year me had some amount of talks thanks to Dual degree and some courses in common. Through that I got to know how good and kind a person you are. Abhi aage dual ke ek saal me hoping to know you better.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Namaskar Srinjay babu, apne toh kaafi yaadein hai saath me. You were my go to guy for being a partner while going home for holidays(Rajdhani apni almost saath me aati thi). Fir. Pandey ke saath gappe ldana, politics aur history ke baare me baate krna..esp about world wars, kaafi knowledgeable bnde ho inn sab me tum. Wing me apan dono ka saath me chuda tha 1st sem so saath me 2nd sem aur aage fir improve kiye apne aapko. Kbhi kbhi lgta tum engg nhi IAS officer ke material ho with interest in politics, history, civics, jo UPSC ki tayyari me zarurat pdta. Wish you all the best for the future ahead. I am sure tum kaafi success paoge, and shyad kbhi collector sahab bhi bnoge.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Utsav bhai...like your chill attitude towards things. Chemineers me saath 2nd year ka time kte the, jhaa tu web dev aur design ka kaam sambhal rha tha (tere T shirt designs abhi bhi hain). Classses me toh hoti thi baate, majorly interaction start hua 6th sem me jb tu Hall 12 shift ho gya. Canteen me deep charche, 381 ka assignment, fir kbhi kabar Southern labs ki canteen me chai samosa thinking abt prepping of GATE. Aur iss sem me TP ke assignments aur quizzes. Honestly, I wish I could have known more about you. But, aage graduation ke baad dosti bni rhegi, ye pkka vaada hain.
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Vipul bro (not bhai cuz you like bro)....knew your name since studying in Allen Kota while watching your name at the leaderboards in exams. Jb pta chla same wing me the that was quite exhilarating. First year se hi tum chaapu the as usual. But you were not the usual type of maggu. You took interest mainly in dance and boy..kya naachte ho. I really miss those sessions where you and Kartik danced together in wing and the wing parties jhaa tumhe aur Kartik chhod sb barati dance krte the. As a person, I have never seen so humble, jolly, helpful and good in everything person. To me, you are kind of what it means to be a cool person. ALL THE BEST FOR YOUR FUTURE ENDEAVOURS BRO!!
author: Anirban  Ghosh

text: Yogi ji...you are really an unorthodox type of person. Kaafi cheerful aur mast aadmi ho. Normally yaar class me toh baate hoti nhi...interaction majorly 3rd me hi hui zyada. Kaafi expert ho yaar tum hasane me. I fondly remember tumhara aur Divyansh ka satirical impressions of Aakash Chopra and Jatin Sapru in H12PL commentary, kaafi mast lga tha yaar wo. Aur baad me pta chla we do believe in same ideology, that created more bonding. Kaafi upkaar kiye ho yaar tum senator bnke iss sem, uss ke liye general thank you. Aage aise hi outspoken aur mast aadmi rho, and wish you all the very best for future comrade!!
author: Anirban  Ghosh
